title: LoL Skin Preview
body:
So the other day I found an app called LoL Skin Preview. I was wondering if I can actually using it or if it is using a 3rd party thing like hacks. I don't want the server picking it up and then banning me for suspected hacks. It says on the website I got it from says it is legit and I saw Brofresco use it one time with Galio. Just making sure.

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
